login.subtitle: Transform your sleeping architectural intellectual property into valuable assets.
login.accountAbstractionNote: Account Abstraction (AA) technology creates a secure smart wallet using your social account. No need to manage mnemonic phrases.
login.heroSubtitle: Join the first Web3 platform designed for architects. Monetize your unused design assets through NFTs with zero gas fees.
login.loginDesc: Login with your preferred social account to get started
login.web3AuthSecurityDesc: Your accounts are secured by multi-party computation (MPC). No seed phrases to remember or lose. Login with Google, Apple, Twitter or email.
login.termsNote: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.author: Creator:
marketplace.noResultsDesc: Your search did not match any NFTs. Try a different query.
marketplace.emptyDesc: There are currently no architectural assets listed for sale.

mint.title: Mint Architectural Asset as NFT
mint.subtitle: Transform your "sleeping assets" into tradable digital assets. Free gas for first-time users!
mint.assetDescriptionPlaceholder: Please describe the content of the asset, design points, etc. in detail.
mint.previewFileDescription: Add a 3D model for web preview

auth.loginRequiredDesc: Login to mint architectural assets as NFTs and start trading.
auth.loginPrompt: Please click the login button in the top right corner.

features.zeroGasFeesDesc: Mint your first NFT without any transaction fees
features.socialLoginDesc: No need to manage private keys or seed phrases

community.title: DAO Community
community.description: A place for creators to connect, collaborate, and grow.
community.designerBio1: 15+ years of experience in creating eco-friendly and energy-efficient buildings. LEED AP certified.
community.designerBio2: Passionate about minimalist aesthetics and functional spaces. Worked on award-winning residential projects.
community.designerBio3: Focuses on integrating nature into urban environments to create resilient and beautiful public spaces.
community.studentProjectDesc1: A study on generative design for public art installations using Grasshopper.
community.studentProjectDesc2: A proposal for affordable and scalable housing solutions for dense urban areas.
community.hobbyistCreationDesc1: A personal project inspired by medieval European castles, modeled and rendered in Blender.
community.hobbyistCreationDesc2: A detailed 2D drawing of a traditional Japanese tea house, focusing on joinery details.
community.studentCallToAction: Are you a student? Mint your academic work and get discovered by the community.
community.hobbyistCallToAction: Join our community and share your passion projects.

customOrder.title: Custom Order
customOrder.description: Request a custom BIM model or design drawing from our talented community.
customOrder.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your requirements in detail, including style, dimensions, and key features.
customOrder.attachmentsDescription: Upload reference images, sketches, or specification documents.
